Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Regenerative^reset; gene to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
My ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; is on the fritz and I need 1 ^orange;Regenerative^reset; gene to complete my work and get it ready for an event! Can you help me out?
Thanks to you, the symposium will be a success! As gratitude, have this ^green;instrument of brutal and calculated murder^reset;! Well, the recipe anyways.
